name: Box Maze 2 : Agent Cubert
description: Jump back into the life of Cubert who after saving his GF from Red has signed up to the S.S.B (Secret Services of Boxes). Your first mission as Agent Cubert is to save the daughter of Gaston. Make your way through 100 new exciting levels while avoiding dangerous hazards and new enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 1.8Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9500 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card Additional Notes: Box Maze 2 hardly uses any computing power and is very likely to run smooth on most computers. If your pc has lower specs than this and runs the game without issues please let us know so we can look into it and update this information.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above. Processor: 2Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 9800 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any sound card
